TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit EventLogReadingException extends System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogException

Docs.summary: Represents an exception that is thrown when an error occurred while reading, querying, or subscribing to the events in an event log.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This exception can be caused by an invalid event query.
## Examples For example code using this class, see [How to: Subscribe to Events in an Event Log](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/62e006d3-9fab-4fdf-a8f8-e23d05498cd4).
